localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Bulls make money, pigs make money, bears get slaughtered.

(I know this won't age well)
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
公牛赚钱，猪赚钱，熊被宰杀。

(我知道这不会很陈旧)

公牛賺錢，豬賺錢，熊被宰殺。

(我知道這不會很陳舊)

previous.excerpt: Email clients like Gmail have intelligent algorithms & know your email sending history. When you make an email marketing mistake they put you in the SPAM Jail. To come out you need to establish good sender reputation & WarmupYourEmail helps you do that.
previous.title: Warmup Your Email - Always land in Inbox by establishing sender reputation

localize.description: 像Gmail这样的邮件客户端有智能算法，知道你的邮件发送历史。当你犯了电子邮件营销的错误，他们会把你关进垃圾邮件监狱。要想出来，您需要建立良好的发件人声誉，而WarmupYourEmail可以帮助您做到这一点。
localize.tagline: 通过建立发件人的信誉，总是能落在收件箱中。

localize.description: 像Gmail這樣的郵件客戶端有智能算法，知道你的郵件發送歷史。當你犯了電子郵件營銷的錯誤，他們會把你關進垃圾郵件監獄。要想出來，您需要建立良好的發件人聲譽，而WarmupYourEmail可以幫助您做到這一點。
localize.tagline: 通過建立發件人的信譽，總是能落在收件箱中。

next.excerpt: We've built Seek a Guru to promote the positive sides of the Internet, that is connecting disciples with gurus virtually to enhance lives, knowledge and experience. Seek a Guru is a platform that will automate bookings, payments, security and integration.
next.title: Seek a Guru - Monetize your knowledge through mentoring

localize.description: 我们建立了Seek a Guru来促进互联网的积极面，那就是把弟子和大师虚拟地连接起来，以提升生活、知识和经验。Seek a Guru是一个平台，它将自动化预订、支付、安全和整合。
localize.tagline: 通过指导使您的知识货币化
